brief_description: Healthy adults (50+ years old) with history of varicella but no history of zoster are vaccinated with Zostavax. Blood and serum are taken prior to vaccination and at several points after. A systems biology approach will be used to identify age-related decreases in immune function and potential predictors and correlates of protection.
brief_title: VZV vaccination in the elderly SLVP020
description: Healthy adults (50+ years old) with history of varicella but no history of zoster are vaccinated with Zostavax. endpoints: Frequency of VZV-specific T cells in peripheral blood, titre of VZV-specific antibodies in serum, gene expression in whole blood and blood cell subsets
hypothesis: Comparing vaccine responses in middle-aged and elderly recipients
objectives: Vaccinate healthy older adults, measure virus-specific immune responses following vaccination.
